stories.text:
I have seen some form of early success to have been a contributing factor in many people's long term goals.

Is random trials till you see some form of early success is the way to find that? How did you come across your current goal? Do you follow a process?
stories.title: How did you come across your current goal or life's purpose?

stories.text:
Oreilly had a great conference called Solid.

For instance the 2015 edition had a marvelous set of talks. I'd love to fly over the pond and attend it, but I can't find many traces of it left online!

stories.text:
Outline.com was a website readability / paywall bypass site. It's been modestly popular for years among HN users, including myself.

The domain now redirects to a seller site: https://outline.com
stories.title: Tell HN: Outline.com is offline, domain for sale
